info.title: CorpNet Business Formation API
info.description: API for managing business formation orders.

get.description: Retrieve a list of available formation packages based on the selected entity type, state, and filing option.

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: Type of business entity to form. Possible values are - LLC, C-Corp, S-Corp, Non-Profit Corporation, and Professional Corporation.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state in which the business is being formed.

parameters.name: filing
parameters.description: The type of filing service requested (e.g., standard, express).

200.description: List of available packages by state, entity, and filing type.

schema.description: The response object containing available business formation packages.

statusCode.description: The HTTP status code of the response in string format.

value.description: Contains the package collection based on query parameters.

packageCollection.description: A list of available formation packages.

items.description: Details of a specific package offering.

entityType.description: The type of business entity the package applies to (e.g., llc, corp).

name.description: The name of the package (e.g., Basic Package, Premium Package).

state.description: The U.S. state where the package is applicable.

productPackages.description: List of individual services or features included in the package.

name.description: The name of the service included in the package.

price.description: The price of the individual service in USD.

400.description: Bad Request – Missing or invalid query parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized – Invalid or missing authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden – You do not have access to this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error – An unexpected error occurred on the server.

example: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

post.description: Creates a new business formation order using partner-supplied details including contact, company info, business address, selected package, and products.

requestBody.description: Payload containing all necessary information to create a business formation order.

apiUserPid.description: API user identifier assigned to the partner.

pcid.description: Partner client identifier used to track the request.

businessStructureType.description: Type of business entity being formed (e.g., LLC, Corporation).

businessStateInitial.description: Two-letter abbreviation of the U.S. state where the business is being formed.

orderTotalPrice.description: Total price of the order in USD.

contactEmail.description: Email address of the primary contact person.

contactFirstName.description: First name of the contact person.

contactLastName.description: Last name of the contact person.

contactPhone.description: Primary phone number of the contact person.

contactEveningPhone.description: Optional evening phone number of the contact person.

companyDesiredName.description: Desired name for the new business entity.

companyBusinessCategory.description: Category of business operations (e.g., retail, services).

companyBusinessDescription.description: Brief description of the business activities.

businessAddressAddress1.description: Primary street address of the business.

businessAddressCity.description: City name of the business address.

businessAddressState.description: State abbreviation of the business address.

businessAddressZip.description: ZIP or postal code of the business address.

registeredAgentIsCorpnetAgent.description: Indicates if CorpNet will act as the registered agent.

registeredAgentFirstName.description: First name of the registered agent (if not CorpNet).

registeredAgentLastName.description: Last name of the registered agent (if not CorpNet).

registeredAgentZip.description: ZIP code of the registered agent.

packageId.description: Identifier for the selected business formation package.

products.description: List of products included in the order.

productId.description: Identifier for the product to include.

schema.description: The response returned after successfully creating a business formation order.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code indicating the result of the request.

partnerOrder.description: The partner's submitted order with assigned metadata.

orderGuid.description: Unique identifier for the created order.

orderPhase.description: Current processing phase of the order.

orderFilingType.description: Type of filing service selected (if any).

apiUserPid.description: API user ID that initiated the order.

businessStructureType.description: Full description of the business structure selected.

businessStateInitial.description: State abbreviation where the business is being formed.

400.description: Invalid request or missing required fields.

500.description: Server error occurred while processing the request.

get.description: Retrieve a summary of a submitted business formation order, including order total and purchased products.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the business formation order to retrieve the summary for.

schema.description: The response containing a summary of a submitted business formation order.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the response.

message.description: A human-readable message indicating success or error.

order.description: Summary details of the business formation order.

orderNumber.description: Public-facing order number assigned to the order.

orderTotal.description: Total price of the order including all selected products.

orderProducts.description: List of all products included in the order with their respective values.

name.description: Name of the ordered product or service.

value.description: Price or value of the individual product in USD.

sortOrder.description: Sort order indicator for product display.

orderProducts.name: California Official Filed Articles of Organization

404.description: No order found for the given order ID.

500.description: Server error occurred while retrieving the order summary.

get.description: Retrieve the full details of a submitted business formation order including contact, address, company info, and processing status.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the order to retrieve full detail.

schema.description: The full response containing all details of a submitted business formation order.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the response.

message.description: A human-readable message indicating success or failure.

partnerOrder.description: Full detail of the submitted business formation order.

orderGuid.description: Unique identifier assigned to the order.

orderPhase.description: The current phase of the order lifecycle.

orderStatus.description: Current status of the order in the system.

orderFilingType.description: Filing type of the order, if applicable.

apiUserPid.description: ID of the API user who submitted the order.

businessStructureType.description: Full name of the selected business entity structure.

businessStateInitial.description: Full name of the U.S. state where the business is being formed.

orderTotalPrice.description: Total price of the order in USD.

contact.description: Contact person information for the order.

companyInfo.description: Information about the company being formed.

businessAddress.description: Physical address where the business will be located.

500.description: Server error occurred while retrieving order details.

post.description: Cancels a business formation order using the provided order GUID. This action is irreversible.

parameters.name: orderGuid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the order to be cancelled. This GUID is generated during order creation.

400.description: Bad Request – Invalid or missing orderGuid.

401.description: Unauthorized – Invalid or missing authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden – Access denied for this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error – Unexpected server error.

example: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

post.description: Downloads a document associated with a formation order.
Sends a document via email related to a business formation order.
Updates the details of an existing business formation order.

400.description: Invalid data or order cannot be updated.
